name: LEMTRADA
treatmentDescriptions: LEMTRADA is indicated as a single disease modifying therapy in adults with highly active relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis (RRMS) for the following patient groups: • Patients with highly active disease despite a full and adequate course of treatment with at least one disease modifying therapy (DMT) or • Patients with rapidly evolving severe relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis defined by 2 or more disabling relapses in one year, and with 1 or more Gadolinium enhancing lesions on brain MRI or a significant increase in T2 lesion load as compared to a previous recent MRI.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
